attributes.action: Britain should not follow the USA in to war on Iran
attributes.additional_details:
Israel is considering a pre-emptive attack on Iran. If this is to happen then the US would get involved and the UK would follow suit. You are probably thinking what has this got to do with us?

More loss of innocent civilian and soldiers lives on both sides!
More strain on our already weak economy!
More blood on the name of this once great country!
More refugees and asylum seekers heading for the UK/US.
More possibility of entering a third World War.

If you would like to have your voice heard then please sign the petition so we can let the government know that the public does not support another illegal War!!
